## ValidationErrorMap interface

Represents a map of validation errors with accociated [ErrorDisplayFn](./dynamic-forms.errordisplayfn.md) Provided with the token [VALIDATION\_ERROR\_MESSAGES](./dynamic-forms.validation_error_messages.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ValidationErrorMap 
```
